template_input_params.name: resource_prefix
template_input_params.label: Instance Name Prefix
template_input_params.description: The name to be prefixed to the VPC Server Instance and all the related resources like VPC, Subnet that will be created by this template.
template_input_params.regexdesc: Use lowercase alphanumeric characters and hyphens only. Must begin with a lower case alphabetic character and end with lowercase alphanumeric character. Maximum length is 20 characters.

template_input_params.name: image_name
template_input_params.label: OS Image Name
template_input_params.description: The name of the IBM Cloud OS image from which the Virtual Servers for Virtual Private Cloud will be created. See IBM Cloud documentation for more details on valid values for this attribute.

template_input_params.name: profile
template_input_params.label: Virtual Server Instance Profile
template_input_params.description: IBM Cloud virtual server profile to be applied to your virtual server. A profile is a combination of instance attributes, such as the number of vCPUs, amount of RAM, and more that can be used to start a virtual server instance. See IBM Cloud documentation for more details on valid values for this attribute.

template_input_params.name: region
template_input_params.label: Region
template_input_params.description: IBM Cloud region to create your virtual server instance in.

template_input_params.name: zone
template_input_params.label: Availability Zone (Must match the region selected)
template_input_params.description: IBM Cloud availability Zone to create your virtual server instance in. The zone value must be in the selected region.

template_input_params.name: public_ssh_key
template_input_params.label: Public SSH key
template_input_params.description: Public SSH key to be set in the virtual server instance.

template_output_params.name: server_floating_ip_address
template_output_params.label: Virtual Server Instance Floating IP address

template_output_params.name: server_private_ip_address
template_output_params.label: Virtual Server Instance Private IP address
